text:
The ANT environment doesn't have ability to include the XML ANT script in the 
main body of the XML ANT script - the feature similar to "import" in java 
or "include" in C. I found that this feature would be a major enhancement in 
the maintenance of my many deployment scripts, where I could have the generic 
body included in many, project-specific scripts.
